body.name: NeatConnect Cloud Scanner and Digital Filing System for PC and Mac, 6003875 (Renewed)
deliveryMessages: This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.
features: This Certified Refurbished product is tested & certified by Neat to look and work like-new. The product includes all original accessories, and is backed by a 90-day warranty
Scan in receipts to create expense reports and searchable databases
Scan in business cards to capture information, send info to address book, sync contacts with your phone
Scan in documents to create searchable pdfs, capture editable text, organize your digital files
body.description: This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far works great time saver for sure I have soo many reciepts weekly I couldn't keep up.
reviews.reviewText: Works great time saver easy set up and easy scan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars A Big Time Waster
reviews.reviewText: The scanner itself seems to be ok.. the problem is with the Neat Software. I've had Neat installed on my computer since the The Neat Company was a startup, selling the scanner and software from Airport Kiosks, It was a great product and company but sadly that is no longer true. Backing up my database to the cloud has taken many weeks with no end in sight and virtually no help at all from the Neat Co. I finally had to stop uploading and will resume trying to get this done when I have several weeks to spare. Rather than a time saver this product has become a time waster.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Have been using a desktop version of the Neat Scanner ...
reviews.reviewText: Have been using a desktop version of the Neat Scanner for years. It started to become slow and jam so decided to purchase new on.In looking at the options, able to purchase a refurbished unit by Neat and upon installing the NeatConnect unit to my existing account, found that all of the problems that I was having with my previous scanner are gone.The cloud based software is geared toward this unit and works much faster and with much more accuracy than my desktop scanner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Setup is no longer easy
reviews.reviewText: Use to be easy to setup and use, but now harder to setup to Google drive. Have not tried One drive because I don't use it. However, I got it to work sending emails.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love the web connect so i don't have to connect ...
reviews.reviewText: I have used and older version for years and it finaly gave up and i got this one. I wished i had gotten this one first. I love the web connect so i don't have to connect too the computer. The real only cripe is the software. I cant scan a bunch of docs and then separate them. But thats a software problem and hope will see that changed in updates.(did contact support about it) You can use this standalone without supcrition or its a 59 dollar a year fee to use online (cloud storage).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars It's OK. Room for a lot of improvement.
reviews.reviewText: If you've used Neat scanners in the past you'll already know they are not perfect. The software is not nearly as intuitive as they advertise and the scanner it self jams and misfeeds commonly. I was "upgrading" from a NeatDesk Desktop scanner after the feed motor died to the NeatConnect thinking and hoping surely a newer model has been upgraded and feeds better. No, it doesn't other than the shape has changed they added wifi and NeatCloud support it is exactly the same scanner with exactly the same problems.Now I've been using neat for about 5 years. I have a lot of information saved in my Neat software. I wouldn't know how to transfer all the info (or it wouldn't be easy even if i had the time to) or I would try something else. For now I'll use it and just yell bad things at it as I do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Almost there... don't shred your documents just because you scanned them!
reviews.reviewText: Software iffy, scanner is fast but has a few firmware bugs as well. The scanner can be controlled by dedicated desktop software which works in conjunction with the "cloud" service to process files. I had to go back to previous version of software because files were disappearing, not syncing and showing up as blanks. In going back to the previous version, now what I have in the "cloud" is not exactly the same as what I have on my computer and I'm afraid of losing files as well as the chance that there are probably files missing that I'll just never know of until I look to retrieve them if the IRS comes and does an audit of past years.The scanner is impressively fast and quite good quality. It does though have trouble feeding the first sheet at times and occasionally wraps and destroys a receipt in it's rollers.I'm getting the job done but I am hoping the lost and shredded documents don't come back to bite me in the...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This thing is awesome!! It has made scanning my receipts etc. SOOO much faster and easier.
reviews.reviewText: This thing is awesome!! It has made scanning my receipts etc. SOOO much faster and easier.
